forum.content: Next year I will go to China for work. And it is my last time post the message on this way. Maybe in this way many people doesn't love it. But I need to working, living there. So I want to know which girl can go with and be my girlfriend. If worry I tell a lie, you can add my line or Facebook first! All my information you can search in it, and then I will use Nov/Dec two month let you know who am I.
forum.title: Who will care who you are !
